alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Preston (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN PRESTON COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Friendsville to 9 miles north of Kingwood. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brandonville, Bruceton Mills, Hazelton, Cranesville, Laurel Run, and Valley Point. This includes Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 18 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
